keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: CIVIL WAR (THE WAR BETWEEN THE STATES)

docs.snippet: All through the loyal States our able-bodied men between the ages of twenty and fifty are springing to arms. The turtle is silent, and the voice of the drill-sergeant is heard in the land.
docs.lead_paragraph: All through the loyal States our able-bodied men between the ages of twenty and fifty are springing to arms. The turtle is silent, and the voice of the drill-sergeant is heard in the land.

docs.snippet: The steamship Adriatic, which left Galway on Tuesday, the 23d inst., arrived at this port at 2 o'clock this afternoon, en route to New-York.

headline.main: TWO DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE.; THE ADRIATIC AT ST. JOHNS THE SAN DOMINGO QUESTION IN SPAIN. Concentration of Russian Troops at Warsaw. Interesting Discussion in the Italian Parliament. Cotton Active Breadstuffs Dull Provisions Steady.Consols 917-8 a 92.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Adriatic, which left Galway on Tuesday, the 23d inst., arrived at this port at 2 o'clock this afternoon, en route to New-York.
